about_the_game:
Player Discussion Group

Main Plot:

Due to a maritime accident, you unexpectedly find yourself on this island and receive a warm invitation to settle here. The village chief enthusiastically introduces you to other residents of the island: Ping, Aunt Lin, the carpenter, and others. Everyone is excited about your arrival. Your mission is to develop the island and embark on a series of exciting explorations.

Gameplay:

Maintain good relationships with NPCs through various distinctive tasks. Each NPC, with their unique personality, has different storylines. In your leisure time, you can earn island currency through mechanisms like fishing, planting, and selling. Use these earnings to purchase more building blueprints for island construction.

You can also take a speedboat from the pier to visit other unique islands, meet more characters, and invite them to join in building the small island.

Character Introductions:

  • Aunt Lin: A kind and virtuous housewife who runs a martial arts school with her daughter for a living

  • Ping'er: Aunt Lin's daughter, who is keen on martial arts

  • Xiao Ai: A somewhat careless shop owner

  • Village chief: The amiable village chief seems to have an unknown past

  • Carpenter: There are always all kinds of strange props in his home

  • Susu: A cat girl who lives deep in the forest and likes fishing with superb skills

  • Xiao Lan: A gentle neighbor sister, but her life has been troubled by some reasons

  • Xiao Qian: A soul that has been sealed for thousands of years, but her personality is still considerate and gentle

  • Lilim: A demon creature teleported from another world, with great ambitions

  • Tsukiko: Susu's sister was adopted by Yoko when she was young

  • Yoko: An elf with wide experience, she traveled all over the world when she was young, and finally lived in seclusion on the Unknown Island because she adopted the Tsukiko sisters

  • Xiaoya: An orc from the jungle island, with a gentle personality and very considerate of others

  • Qingqing: Unlike Xiaoya, Qingqing has a natural aversion to humans

  • Xiaobai: In short, she is very cute

  • Anka: Due to the desert sunshine, Anka has a beautiful wheat skin color

  • Mumu: The first king of the desert island, sealed in the pyramid because of a curse

  • Wilsey: No one knows where she came from (with a new interactive gameplay)

  • Theresa Nun: The nun has a close relationship with the mysterious church behind her

  • Magician Circe: A magician who is devoted to cracking the secret of "Tarnished"

  • Female Knight Commander: The solemn and majestic female knight commander inspires respect

  • Bai: Another poor person, please take her home

  • Caiyun: She was betrayed by her loved ones and ended up like this

  • Indian Summer: A girl from a mysterious organization

The game is not finished yet, and more new characters will continue to be introduced

highlighted.name: No Need to Thank Me, I'm a Helpful Islander

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters are 18+.
It is not suitable to play in the workplace.
No drugs and alcohol or self-harm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: You encountered a storm at sea and unexpectedly arrived at this small island. On this island, you can start a new life through activities like planting, construction, fishing, and more. Experience the storyline with various NPCs as you join the team to build and develop the small island!
